title: Amber's Christmas Surprise
description: Jewels Cafe is ready for Christmas, and there's no one Amber would rather spend spend it with than her fated mates. But this year, Julian, Chase, and Wes plan to surprise Amber with the perfect gift. Can they keep her from peeking before Christmas day? And do they really know her well enough to get her the perfect gift... and give her the perfect Christmas?
author: Mia Harlan
